text:
This is a 59 y.o. Male with HD dependent ESRD, CAD s/p MI, non-ischemic
   CMY (EF 35-40%)  who presents w/ 3day h/o malaise- Pt was found down on
   floor @ [**Hospital3 **] confused & disoriented- Initially, was
   hyperkalemic w/ backpain and hemodynamically [**Hospital 10157**] transferred to ICU
   from floor on [**2117-8-26**] for suspicion of GPC sepsis from HD line and
   hypotension-
   HD tunnel cath D/C
   Sepsis without organ dysfunction
   Assessment:
   GPC bacterimia per blood cultures- + mult abcessesses seen on lung CT-
   WBC 21.3 trending up (17.3)- T max 100.1 PO-
   Action:
   New R fem dialysis cath inserted in IR- repeat chest CT done- zosyn
   D/C
d- con
t on vanco & levetiracetam.
   Response:
   SBP 80
s- low 100
   Plan:
   Renal failure, End stage (End stage renal disease, ESRD)
   Assessment:
   Action:
   Response:
   Plan:
